channel.title: Visual problems
channel.description:
Well, every male scientist has blood on them, I snapped the scientists on the main menu to show an example:
[img]https://puu.sh/15uDR[/img] [img]https://puu.sh/15uE4[/img]
I'm assuming this isn't normal, at the beginning I crashed on the menu but changed the directx level to 9.0 through the launch options but it seems to be giving out lots of visual problems like:
When I leave the menu it has this.. But it slowly fades to the correct colours again [img]https://puu.sh/15uJb[/img]
When I use a dropdown box..... [img]https://puu.sh/15uJg[/img]
flickers to what it should look like and this.. [img]https://puu.sh/15uJv[/img]
Windows 7 X64 In-game there are no visual problems other than scientists still have blood on them, but I get crashes all the time.
dumps: {[url='https://puu.sh/15uO0']download[/url]} Main menu crash {[url='https://puu.sh/15vTb']download[/url]} In-game crash

item.description:
I have the same issues. Any updates?

Read full topic

item.title: Visual problems
item.dc:creator: instinx
item.description:
xaronax:

Having the exact same problems. Tried every launch option suggested in 4 different threads. Crashes constantly. Objects fade in 3 feet in front of my face instead of rendering properly, all characters have bloody/wrong skin. Total mess.

Really disappointing, but I assume it’s something wrong on my end? I checked MD5 of all files, have reinstalled 5 times now. Verified integrity of all related steam tools.

I quit.

I’ve given up too.
Simply waiting for some fixes.

Read full topic

I’m assuming this isn’t normal, at the beginning I crashed on the menu but changed the directx level to 9.0 through the launch options but it seems to be giving out lots of visual problems like:
